data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Cheng-Bin, Nishikawa, Masaaki, Perreau, Michel, Ruzicka, Jan, Hayashi, Yasuhiko (2016): Revision of the genus Ptomaphagus Hellwig (Coleoptera, Leiodidae, Cholevinae) from Taiwan Island. ZooKeys 609: 43-62, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.9327, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.9327
